mapper.insert: insert into Restaurant(res_no, res_name, res_call, res_address, res_content, res_menu, res_img1, res_img2, res_img3, res_genre, res_colCon, res_colGlass, res_colSer, res_colOpen, res_amenPrivate, res_amenPaking, res_amenParty, res_amenValet, res_amenRental, res_amenSoml) values(Restaurant_seq.nextval, #{res_no}, #{res_name}, #{res_call}, #{res_address}, #{res_content}, #{res_menu}, #{res_img1}, #{res_img2}, #{res_img3}, #{res_genre}, #{res_colCon}, #{res_colGlass}, #{res_colSer}, #{res_colOpen}, #{res_amenPrivate}, #{res_amen}, #{res_amenPaking}, #{res_amenParty}, #{res_amenValet}, #{res_amenRental}, #{res_amenSoml})
